choices.A: Configure an Inventory report from the "Alerts" tab.
choices.B: Write an RQL query from the "Investigate" tab.
choices.D: Generate a compliance report from the Compliance dashboard.
choices.C: Open the Asset dashboard, filter on Amazon Web Services, and click "Amazon RDS" resources.

questions.question_text: All Amazon Regional Database Service (RDS)-deployed resources and the regions in which they are deployed can be identified by Prisma Cloud using which two methods? (Choose two.)
Which subcommand invokes the scan for images built with Jenkins in an OpenShift environment?
Which Resource Query Language (RQL) query returns a list of all TERMINATED Google Compute Engine (GCE) instances?

choices.B: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'gcloud-compute-instances-list' = TERMINATED
choices.C: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'gcloud-compute-instances-list* and json.rule = status TERMINATED
choices.A: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'gcloud-compute-instances-list' and json.rule = is TERMINATED
choices.D: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'gcloud-compute-instances-list' and json.rule = contains TERMINATED status

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
【たぶん】
C. console address

Selected Answer: C
C is correct. 
A is incorrect, because when performing a scan, the image needs to reside on the system where twistcli runs https://pan.dev/prisma-cloud/docs/twistcli_gs/

questions.question_text:
The following error is received when performing a manual twistcli scan on an image: sudo ./twistcli images scan -u bca208cf-26fa-43c6-ac6S-edbl840f8a5S -p 69s+DUqceuxndIF52mo4JDHlpLA-proxy:1.0
What is missing from the command?

choices.A: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-sql-db-list' and json.rule = transparentDataEncryption is false
choices.C: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-sql-db-list' and json.rule transparentDataEncryption is on
choices.B: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-sql-db-list' and json.rule transparentDataEncryption is true
choices.D: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-sql-db-list' and json.rule = transparentDataEncryption = true

questions.question_text: Which Resource Query Language (RQL) query returns a list of all Azure SQL Databases that have transparent data encryption turned on?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
【たぶん】
B. config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-sql-db-list' and json.rule transparentDataEncryption is true
※ Config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-sql-db-list' and json.rule = trasparentDataEncryption is true

Selected Answer: B
there is no correct answer. Formatted request looks as follows: config from cloud.resource where api.name = 'azure-sql-db-list' and json.rule = transparentDataEncryption is true 

There must be "=" and "is true", but there is no such option
